critters.name: Fiammor
critters.description: Bug that eats lava and uses heat to defend itself.

critters.name: Hareed
critters.description: Burrows into shifting dunes, super fast.

critters.name: Kurzharn
critters.description: Dark Obsidian looking reptile with thick skin.

critters.name: Vulcana
critters.description: LARGE Bird that lives near fiery mountains, can't see at night.

critters.name: Saharidon
critters.description: Chonky oasis dwelling creature that lives in pools of water.

critters.name: Marisect
critters.description: A gossamer winged swimmer with bright colors.

critters.name: Oceanicet
critters.description: Deep ocean dwelling water mannal with webeed limbs, can also walk on land.

critters.name: Skyvern
critters.description: Lives way above the clouds, sharp talons like a mini water-whelp.

critters.name: Aerornith
critters.description: Large wingspan bird never needs to touch the ground. Keen eye-sight.

critters.name: Aquarai
critters.description: Iridescent scales, long, semi-translucent. Moves fast through water, has gills.

critters.name: Qannuc
critters.description: Thick exoskeleton anti-freeze like chemicals in it's blood with sharp mandibles.

critters.name: Taivassu
critters.description: Magestic mammal, long legs, thick coat, keen smell to sniff vegetation in snow.

critters.name: Kivik
critters.description: Razor sharp claws, armored hide, powerful jaws, cliffhanger.

critters.name: Jaasi
critters.description: Snowy white feathers, sharp talons and beak, suited for cold climates.

critters.name: Aqsiktac
critters.description: A large cat with claws that gleam like sapphires.

critters.name: Varvas
critters.description: Razor sharp claws, antennae to navigate in dark, can climb, chew through rocks.

critters.name: Grottohund
critters.description: Tunneling mammal with good sense of smell, dense, small.

critters.name: Suomu
critters.description: Retractable claws, dark scales, forked tongue, sharp teeth.

critters.name: Darter
critters.description: Small agile bird, sturdy wings, brownish, can camouflage with dark surfaces,

critters.name: Duskscale
critters.description: Related to the Suomu, by built for water, long fins and flowing. Glowing eyes.

critters.name: Densarvi
critters.description: Bright green, blends in, can fly short distances, horned for defense. Eats nectar.

critters.name: Ardob
critters.description: Bear like creature, forager, thick brown fur, elongated face.

critters.name: Verdilo
critters.description: Bright colord lizard like creature large expressive eyes, speedy.

critters.name: Azuquila
critters.description: Blue/Green Plummage, fly at high speeds, sharp eyesight, social bird lives in group.

critters.name: Fluvinix
critters.description: Sleek long flatttened head, deep rich greenish scales sharpe teeth, underbite.

keywords.name: Produce
keywords.description: Produces resource

keywords.name: Steal
keywords.description: Steals resources from the opponent if possible

keywords.name: Fast
keywords.description: Activates in a phase that takes place before normal combat

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.description: Activates in a phase that takes place after normal combat

keywords.name: Strength
keywords.description: Does extra damage to critters of a certain type

keywords.name: Weakness
keywords.description: Takes extra damage from critters of a certain type

keywords.name: Elusive
keywords.description: Ignores X damage events during the battle.

keywords.name: Immune
keywords.description: Immune to damage from critters of a certain type

keywords.name: Venomous
keywords.description: Puts an number of poison counters on their target if they damage them, any time a card activates they suffer damage relative to the number of poison counters. After suffering damage the poison counter is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Poisonous
keywords.description: Puts a number of poison counters on their attacker if they get hurt, any time a card activates they suffer damage relative to the number of poison counters. After suffering damage the poison counter is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Thorns
keywords.description: Critter deals a number of damage if they are injured/damaged

keywords.name: Angry
keywords.description: Critter deals more damage if they are injured/damaged

keywords.name: Regenerate
keywords.description: Heals itself a certain amount

keywords.name: Powerful
keywords.description: Critters who suffer powerful damage become stunned fro certain amount of spins

keywords.name: Healing
keywords.description: Heals adjacent critters a certain amount

keywords.name: Bolster
keywords.description: Critter will amplify adjacent critter damage by a certain amount

keywords.name: Hibernate
keywords.description: Critter is dormant until it receives an amount of damage each battle

keywords.name: Unshakeable
keywords.description: Critter is immune to stun effects

keywords.name: Trapper
keywords.description: Enemies damaged by this critter do not spin for X spins

keywords.name: Slippery
keywords.description: Critter can't be trapped by trapper critters

keywords.name: Last Stand
keywords.description: When card is KO'd it gets a defined keyword mentioned in the card

keywords.name: Loner
keywords.description: Increased stats if this critter is the last one alive

keywords.name: Multicolored
keywords.description: This critter counts as being part of multiple biomes/colors

keywords.name: Colorless
keywords.description: The critter does not count as having a color

keywords.name: Growth
keywords.description: Gain amount of ??? every round it survives

keywords.name: Pacifist
keywords.description: Gains amount of health if no critter has been KO'd this round

keywords.name: Parasitic
keywords.description: Absorbs an amount of health from adjacent critters

keywords.name: Defender
keywords.description: Damage to adjacent cards are directed to this critter

keywords.name: Transient
keywords.description: Critter will KO after an amount of activations

keywords.name: Mulligan
keywords.description: The player has a once per round option to roll again if critter is drawn

keywords.name: Guarded
keywords.description: Damage is directed to an adjacent card

keywords.name: Timeless
keywords.description: Damage to this card is persistent in matches, when knocked out it is removed from the game

keywords.name: Hinder
keywords.description: Attackers damaging this card are locked in place for X spins.
